name: Word Pass
description:
Word Pass is a submission to the cybersecurity game jam!

The game was basically made in a couple of hours and your goal of the game is to write down as many passwords as you can!

Assets used:

Music: https://opengameart.org/content/calm-loop

UI: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/essentials/unity-samples-ui-25468

SFX: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/ui-sfx-36989
